onboarding.title: Get Started with Vault Sync
onboarding.description: Follow these steps to start synchronizing your vaults across devices.

download.title: Download haex
download.description: Download and install the haex app on your device to create and manage encrypted vaults.

createVault.title: Create a Vault
createVault.description: Open the haex app and create a new vault. Your vault is encrypted locally with your password.

connect.title: Connect to Sync
connect.description: In the app, go to Settings > Sync and sign in with your haex.space account to sync your vaults.

vaults.title: Your Vaults
vaults.emptyHint: Create a vault in the haex app and connect it to your account.

syncDialog.title: Connect to Sync Server
syncDialog.description: Enter your password to connect to the sync server and view your vaults.
syncDialog.error: Failed to connect. Please check your password.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Vault
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the vault "{name}"? This will permanently remove all synced data from the server. This action cannot be undone.
